review_data.content: Nice Nooch, friendly staff. Food is delicious and the drinks are amazing. Make sure to make a reservation if yoya re a bigger group. Try a little bit of everything, good prices

Very stylish modern asian restaurant, part of a larger chain but doesn't feel like it. The menu is sushi, Japanese, Thai, a bit of everything with a modern touch. The food and drinks are great and I like that they have specials every couple of months, so you can try something new. Even my parents in law loved it! Also the staff is really friendly, shout out to Simona who makes us feel welcome every time!
Great location. Delicious food for the price. Definitely recommend it.

The food was really delicious. The staff was super friendly. Martin is the nicest manager and Eva is the best waitress ever, super friendly and helpful. I'm looking forward to come back again.
Diana :)
Just perfect! If tou happen to be around, you must try! Eva who served us was excellent! I had a really spicy curry plate and it still burns! 5/5!!!!

Good and original asian cuisine (we tried a korean « dragonfruit » burger with sweet potatoes fries and a semi frozen macha tiramisu), correct prices, comfortable environnement. Good service but only you have too wait to long (but it seems a weakness in many restaurants).

I love the ramen!
And Eva, she’s super nice and helpful :)

Nice atmosphere, good food and good music, what else do you need? ;)
Food is great. Do not come hungry in a busy day - service is extremely slow. Recommend tho.
Great and various dishes, many vegetarian or vegan options. Friendly service and lovely atmosphere. :)

Been coming to Nooch @ Mall of Switzerland for a while now, staff is always helpful & friendly and the quality of the food is always top notch. Now waiting for the warmer weather so that I can seat outside again!
Great service, healthy fresh food, wide variety and tastes fantastic!

Interior very stylish, clean and contemporary.
Quality of food is outstanding. Everything I try out is delicious.
Furthermore, you get served quickly and receive your order fastly.
a lovely place to stop by at the Mall of Switzerland if you prefer some nice sushi! service was great and very friendly.
Good food, sushi is expensive (wich is normal) Service personnel is trying to connect on a personal base wich isn't my cup of tea. All in all good expirience.
Fantastic place, like so much.  Served by Eva, best one😃
Excellent!!!! My favorite sushi place in Lucern
Really nice atmosphere and the food is great!
Good Sushi and nice interior design. It took quite some time to order. Maybe the management should hire more waiters.
One of the best asian restaurants even for vegetarians in Lucern.
Great food!! Our waiter Kevin was so friendly and helpful ☺️
The food is delicious and very good service
Eva was fantastic great service and very polite!

We went there Friday evening.
There were a lot of tables, but we had to wait.
After 10mins a waiter said our table is ready,  but he started talking with another guests so we had to wait again.
Drinks came fast, but we had to wait more than half hour for starters.
And after starters we needed to wait again for main dishes.
My husband asked a waitress to bring him a bowl of rice, but she forgot that and later she asked us did we finish.
We were not happy for everything, so we wanted to pay and leave soon.
But again we had to wait for her because she went to another tables to ask another orders and talk with her friends.
Servis and foods are not value for the price.
We will not go again and never recommend our friends.
Fresh, spicy food. Kind service
Eva was very helpful and friendly
Enjoyed the food. Lots of vegetarian and vegan options. Prices are high. Lovely decor
Eva was great!!!! Thank you, Eva!
Food is a bit more authentic than typical Asian fare in Switzerland. Attentive staff with friendly service!
very wide selection of sushi in relaxed and cozy athmosphere.. homemade lemonades are very delicious!
The best

I had a very nice lunch there today with good service.
nice but lack of personal touch
Top Service and good authentic food. Cozy and relaxed atomsphere.
Work more on customer service. Should be better food quality for this prices.

(Translated by Google) The best sushi I've ever eaten! Very many different, unusual varieties! Really GREAT!! We were completely satisfied. Our server Simona was very nice and accommodating! We'd love to come back!!

I think it's a shame because we all like different things. I think it would be much better if every guest received an order form and could put their own meal together.

(Translated by Google) An almost perfect evening. As a guest, you don't even notice that it also has a take-away area. Super solved with the separation. First, you will be welcomed in a very friendly manner (spontaneous decision from us). The Covid certificate is meticulously checked 👍. Simona, who served us through the entire stay, was very nice, courteous, gave my girlfriend great advice and always smiled (she also looks great, despite the mask 😉). The braised beef with ginger was delicious. The only deduction is due to the miso soup. It came out lukewarm and boring. No pep, the tofu was overcooked and shredded on the tongue. Serve hot and add the smoked tofu (tip from me) to the soup at the very end. That would have given the 5 star. We'll definitely be back and hope that Simona will be on duty again.

(Original)
Ein fast perfekter Abend. Dass es auch einen Take-Away Bereich hat, merkt man als Gast überhaupt nicht. Super gelöst mit der Abtrennung. Als 1. wird man sehr freundlich empfangen (Spontanentscheid von uns). Das Covid-Zertifikat wird penibel genau kontrolliert 👍. Simona, welche uns durch den ganzen Aufenthalt bedient hat, war sehr nett, zuvorkommend, hat meine Freundin super beraten und hat immer gelächelt (sie sieht auch super aus, trotz Maske 😉). Das geschmorte Rindfleisch mit Ginger war köstlich. Einziger Abzug ist der Miso Suppe zu verdanken. Sie kam lauwarm und langweili daher. Kein pep, das Tofu war zerkocht und zerviel auf der Zunge. Heiss servieren und den ev. geräucherten Tofu (Tipp von mir) ganz am Schluss in die Suppe geben. Das hätte den 5 Stern gegeben. Wir kommen auf jeden Fall nochmals und hoffen, dass die Simona wieder Dienst hat.

(Translated by Google) Although we live near the mall and we walk past the Nooch umpteen times (bus), it was my first visit to the Nooch. Shame we've never been... I never thought the food there would be so delicious and also a feast for the eyes. The menu offers something for everyone and it was difficult for us to decide which menu to choose. In addition: Tasty, homemade beverage creations! Uncomplicated "you culture". That's why the Nooch made us even more likeable. The menu is available online: always up-to-date, clearly laid out, without paper and therefore much more ecological. Bravo that you are on the road on time!!
The fact that the toilets are not in the restaurant but in the mall didn't bother us at all. You are only a few meters away and it would be absurd to offer sanitary facilities again in the restaurant.

@Larissa: A huge compliment to you!! With your hearty, cheerful, uncomplicated but above all very competent manner, you were the icing on the cake for us!!!!
Thanks of course also to the great kitchen and service crew for their work, which we pay tribute to!! We can heartily recommend the Nooch!
Many thanks for the great evening with you! Bruno & Daniela

(Original)
Obwohl wir in der Nähe der Mall wohnen und wir x-mal beim Nooch vorbei gehen (Bus), war es für mich der 1. Besuch im Nooch. Schande, dass wir noch nie da waren... Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass die Speisen dort so lecker und ebenso ein Augenschmaus sind. Die Speisekarte bietet jedem etwas und die Entscheidung der Menüwahl fiel uns schwer. Zudem: Schmackhafte, selbstgemachte Getränke-Kreationen! Unkomplizierte "Du-Kultur". Uns hat das Nooch genau deswegen noch viel sympathischer gemacht. Speisekarte steht online zur Verfügung: stets aktuell, übersichtlich gestaltet, ohne Papier und deshalb viel ökologischer. Bravo, dass ihr zeitgerecht unterwegs seit!!
Dass die Toiletten nicht im Restaurant, sondern in der Mall sind, störte uns überhaupt nicht. Sie sind ja nur wenige Meter und es wäre doch widersinnig, im Restaurant nochmals sanitäre Anlagen anzubieten.

@Larissa: Ein mega grosses Kompliment an dich!! Mit deiner herzlich-fröhlichen, unkomplizierten aber v.a. auch sehr kompetenten Art warst du für uns das Tüpfelchen auf dem "i"!!!!
Danke natürlich auch der tollen Küchen- und Service-Crew für ihre Arbeit, die wir mit Respekt zollen!! Wir können das Nooch von Herzen weierempfehlen!
Herzlichen Dank für den super Abend bei euch! Bruno & Daniela

(Translated by Google) First of all: We are not among those people who only award 1 or 5 stars as (unfortunately) more and more people on comparison portals. We find a differentiated assessment and evaluation honest and important.
We love going to Nooch in the Mall of Switzerland to eat. The menu is extensive and there is often something new to add. The dishes, especially the sushi variations, are really delicious by Western standards. There is also a good selection of Asian beers or homemade soft drinks. The friendliness and attentiveness of the service is generally always a bit dependent on the individual and the current number of people, but mostly good. Big compliments at this point to Simona, who served us yesterday and did a great job!
Why do we still only give 4 stars? We just find that on a scale of 1-5 with 5 stars, everything really has to fit completely. It should not be the case that half of the restaurants that you visit are given the top rating, as otherwise no differentiation can be made. Because there is a scale for that, namely that you can make honest comparisons. What z. B. What I don't like is that it is often very cold inside. Not only in winter, but also in late autumn or early spring. In addition, there is always a bit of a draft. It is also a shame that there are no private toilets and that you always have to leave the restaurant and walk through the mall to the public toilets. These are two rather small points of criticism and of course it is not the case that the food is spoiled by it :-) We still enjoy the food :-) But with an honest review we find that this is enough to subtract one point from the review. Because you won't find these points of criticism in the very best restaurants and that's why you should differentiate between them.
All in all, we can still warmly recommend the restaurant to everyone who likes to eat sushi or generally Asian (there are also many delicious Korean-inspired dishes!). It is definitely one of the tastiest restaurants of its kind in Central Switzerland.

(Original)
Vorneweg: Wir gehören nicht zu denjenigen Personen, welche nur 1 oder 5 Sterne vergeben wie (leider) immer mehr Personen auf Vergleichportalen. Eine differenzierte Beurteilung und Bewertung finden wir ehrlich und wichtig.
Wir gehen sehr gerne ins Nooch in der Mall of Switzerland essen. Die Karte ist reichhaltig und es kommt auch öfters mal was Neues dazu. Die Speisen, insbesondere die Sushi-Variationen, sind für westliche Verhältnisse wirklich ausgesprochen lecker. Dazu gibt es eine gute Auswahl an asiatischen Bieren oder hausgemachten Softdrinks. Die Freundlichkeit und Aufmerksamkeit der Bedienung ist im Generellen immer etwas abhängig von den einzelnen Personen und dem gegenwärtigen Menschenaufkommen, meistens aber gut. Grosses Lob an dieser Stelle an Simona, welche uns gestern bedient hat und das toll gemacht hat!
Warum wir trotzdem nur 4 Sterne geben? Wir finden einfach, dass in einer Skala von 1-5 bei 5 Sternen wirklich komplett alles passen muss. Es sollte nicht sein, dass man die Hälfte der Restaurants, die man besucht, mit der Top-Bewertung auszeichnet, da ansonsten keine Differenzierung mehr vorgenommen werden kann. Denn dafür ist eine Skala da, nämlich, dass man ehrliche Vergleiche anstellen kann. Was uns z. B. nicht gefällt ist, dass es drinnen oft sehr kalt ist. Nicht nur im Winter, sondern auch schon im Spätherbst oder frühen Frühling. Ausserdem zieht es immer ein bisschen. Es ist zudem schade, dass keine eigenen Toiletten vorhanden sind und man daher immer das Restaurant verlassen und durch die Mall zu den öffentlichen Toiletten laufen muss. Das sind zwei eher kleine Kritikpunkte und natürlich ist es nicht so, dass einem dadurch das Essen vermiest wird :-) Wir geniessen das Essen trotzdem :-) Aber bei einer ehrlichen Bewertung finden wir, dass das genügt um einen Punkt in der Bewertung abzuziehen. Denn bei den allerbesten Restaurants findet man diese Kritikpunkte eben nicht und darum sollte man das differenzieren.
Alles in allem können wir das Restaurant trotzdem wärmstens empfehlen an alle, die gerne Sushi oder generell asiatisch essen (es gibt auch viele leckere koreanisch angehauchte Gerichte!). Es gehört definitiv zu den leckersten Restaurants dieser Art in der Zentralschweiz.

(Translated by Google) I love your sushi ❤️ whether in the restaurant or takeaway! They are always fresh, very nice to look at, great selection and delicious!

Seit der Eröffnung war ich bestimmt schon 6 Mal dort und werde auch weiterhin das Restaurant regelmässig besuchen und weiterempfehlen.

(Translated by Google) Big disappointment :-( We were there as a group and signed up for the All you can eat. Unfortunately, the "Sushi card" there is not identical to the PDF file on the website. The All you can eat is advertised as that you can feast your way through the sushi menu. If you then open it as a PDF, you will find a generous selection of sushi, dim sum and dessert. This pleases not only the sushi fans in the group, but also the hesitant not -Fish and non-algae lovers, since you can just take the other vegetables and meat offerings, BUT THAT WASN'T SO! We were only allowed to cross with some sushi variations - this caused irritation and disappointment. The feeling of not receiving what beautiful marketing promises remains.

The service was very courteous and could understand our frustration, but did nothing, it was down to the management and that was just not on site. Too bad.

(Original)
Grosse Enttäuschung :-( Wir waren als Gruppe dort und haben uns für das All you can eat angemeldet. Leider ist die dortige «Sushi-Karte» nicht identisch mit der als PDF hinterlegten auf der Website. Das All you can eat wird damit beworben, dass man sich durch die Sushikarte schlemmen kann. Wenn man diese dann als PDF öffnet, findet sich hier eine grosszügige Auswahl von Sushi über Dim Sum bis hin zum Dessert. Das freut in der Gruppe nicht nur die Sushi-Fans, sondern auch die zögerlichen Nicht-Fisch- und Nicht-Algenliebhaber, da man ja einfach die anderen Gemüse und Fleischangebote nehmen kann. DEM WAR ABER NICHT SO! Wir durften nur bei einigen Sushivariationen Kreuzchen machen - das sorgte für Irritation und Enttäuschung. Das Gefühl, nicht erhalten zu haben, was das schöne Marketing verspricht bleibt.

Der Service war sehr zuvorkommend und konnte unseren Frust auch verstehen, jedoch nichts machen, es liege halt am Management und das sei eben nicht hier vor Ort. Schade.
